pytket.cirq¶

Module for conversion between Google Cirq and \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) primitives.

pytket.cirq.cirq_to_tk(circuit: cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit) → pytket.circuit.Circuit¶

Converts a Cirq Circuit to a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit object.

Return type

Circuit

Parameters

circuit (Circuit) – The input Cirq Circuit

Raises

NotImplementedError – If the input contains a Cirq Circuit operation which is not yet supported by pytket

Returns

The \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit corresponding to the input circuit

pytket.cirq.tk_to_cirq(tkcirc: pytket.circuit.Circuit) → cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit¶

Converts a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit object to a Cirq Circuit.

Return type

Circuit

Parameters

tkcirc (Circuit) – The input \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit

Returns

The Cirq Circuit corresponding to the input circuit

pytket.cirq.xmon_to_device(xmon: cirq.google.xmon_device.XmonDevice) → pytket.device.Device¶

Generates a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Device object for a Cirq XmonDevice .

Return type

Device

Parameters

xmon (XmonDevice) – The device to convert

Returns

The corresponding \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Device
